content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for coming, Miss Abbasi. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. As for the rental price, I'm open to offers. What did you have in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I've seen similar apartments in the area, and I believe a fair price would be around 650 Euro per month. Is that something you would consider?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, 650 Euro per month is not bad, but I think we can do better. How about 700 Euro? It's a nice, round number, and it reflects the quality of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your offer, but I must be honest. For a newly built apartment in the city center, I was hoping for something closer to 600 Euro per month. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at 675 Euro?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 675 Euro is a bit lower than I had in mind, but I'm willing to negotiate. Since you seem like a serious tenant, I'll counter with 690 Euro. This is my final offer. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your generosity, Mister Schmidt. I believe 690 Euro is a fair price, considering the location and amenities. I agree to the price of 690 Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be yours for 690 Euro per month. When would you like to move in?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm thrilled to have found such a wonderful apartment! I would like to move in as soon as possible, ideally within the next two weeks. Is that feasible?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly! We can arrange for the move-in date to be within the next two weeks. I'll contact my team to handle the paperwork and arrange for the keys. Once everything is in order, we'll have a contract ready for you to sign. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, thank you, Mister Schmidt. Your help has been greatly appreciated. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment and making it my new home. Is there anything else I need to do before moving in?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Not at all, Miss Abbasi. We'll take care of everything. You can expect the contract and the keys within the next few days. In the meantime, if you have any questions or need any additional information, feel free to contact me. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you again, Mister Schmidt. I'm very excited about my new home! I'll be in touch if I have any questions. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
